document.full_text: the former giant david tyree will run the tough mudder, considered one of the world's more grueling endurance competitions, to raise money for the injured rutgers defensive lineman eric legrand.
document.title: tyree running to raise funds for rutgers's eric legrand
lines_and_colors: the former giant david tyree will run the tough mudder, considered one of the world's more grueling endurance competitions, to raise money for the injured rutgers defensive lineman eric legrand.
